Peter Buchanan (amụrụ n'afọ 1942, na Malawi) bụ ónyé na-ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ, onye na-eme atụmatụ obodo, ónyé edemede, ónyé nkatọ, ónyé nkuzi na onye na-ahụ màkà ihe ngosi.
A maara ya nke ọma màkà usoro edemede ya dị oke egwu màkà The Big Rethink nke The Architectural Review bipụtara na màkà akwụkwọ ya gbasara ihe owuwu.

Mgbè ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Zimbabwe, Buchanan gụrụ ihe owuwu na Mahadum Cape Town, mgbè ọ gụsịrị akara ugo mmụta ya na 1968 ya na ndị na-ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ na Cape Town rụkọtara ọrụ, nke mbụ ya na Gabriel Fagan wee ruo 1971 ya na Revel Fox
N'ikpeazụ, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka ónyé na-ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ na ónyé na-emepụta Ọbọdọ na Africa, Europe na Middle East
N'afọ 1979, Buchanan malitere ịrụ ọrụ na The Architect's Journal na The Architecteural Review, na 1982 ghọrọ osote ónyé nchịkọta akụkọ The Architectural Review
Kemgbe afọ 1992 ọ na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye nweere onwe ya.
Buchanan haziri ihe ngosi na-agagharị agagharị Renzo Piano Building Workshop: Selected Projects and Ten Shades of Green màkà Architectural League of New York
Akwụkwọ ya gụnyere ọrụ sitere na ihe ngosi ndị a: mpịakọta ise nke Renzo Piano Building Workshop: Complete Works na Ten Shades of Green
Buchanan arụwokwa ọrụ dị ka ónyé ndụmọdụ na ọrụ ime obodo na mbipụta.
